OGLAF

31 Oct 2018

I often worry I am too open on this blog. This post, doubly so.

I've been having a rough time lately, but one of the things that has been cheering me up lately is... OGLAF. Is it a webcomic? Kinda. Is it porn? Well, it is certainly pornographic in parts at least, so I guess... maybe.

Am I recommending you porn? I hope not.

It's funny, in a slightly outrageous way. It just also happens to have a lot of genitals in it too. If you can suspend judgment and read it with an open mind... I think it is pretty good.
